committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill for the relief of the city of Dickinson, North Dakota.

summary.text: Relieves a city in North Dakota of all obligations incurred in a contract entered into with the Secretary of the Interior concerning construction of certain facilities under the Reclamation Authorization Act of 1975, notwithstanding certain provisions of such Act. Empowers the Secretary with sole responsibility for the operation, maintenance, and administration of any facilities constructed in such city under such Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the city of Dickinson, North Dakota.
